Uses of Package
model

Packages that use model
controller Executes commands issued by the GUI, such as making changes to the model or loading and saving data. 
gui Contains the application's graphical user interface. 
model Contains the circuit model and implements logic for running the simulation. 
 

Classes in model used by controller
Model
          A Model is the logical representation of a collection of circuits.
Wire
          A Wire object represents the logical aspect of a wire in the model.
 

Classes in model used by gui
LogicComponent
          LogicComponent is the abstract class that all components extend.
Wire
          A Wire object represents the logical aspect of a wire in the model.
 

Classes in model used by model
LogicComponent
          LogicComponent is the abstract class that all components extend.
LogicComponent.ConnectionPoint
          A ConnectionPoint object encapsulates all the information necessary to represent the endpoint of a connection made to a LogicComponent: the component, the pin number on the component and the id number of the wire attached to the pin on the component, if it exists (otherwise null).
LogicComponentFactory
          Provides functionality for creating LogicComponent objects from a given type string.
Model
          A Model is the logical representation of a collection of circuits.
Wire
          A Wire object represents the logical aspect of a wire in the model.
WireFactory
          Provides functionality for creating Wire objects.
